detaileddescription.para: standard rte read interface. reads the signal out of OSEK Buffer.

simplesect.para: reentrant No context Only out of the runnable configured in the SST thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous

parameterdescription.para: Parameter of type <dataType>. [out] transformerStatus Parameter of type <dataType>. The <dataType> must defined in SST. range defined in SST. resolution factor = defined in SST offset = defined in SST. unit defined in SST.

simplesect.para: Std_ReturnType - as described by the AUTOSAR specifications. range {RTE_E_OK, RTE_E_INVALID,RTE_E_MAX_AGE_EXCEEDED,RTE_E_NEVER_RECEIVED,RTE_E_OUT_OF_RANGE,RTE_E_UNCONNECTED}. resolution factor = N/A offset = N/A. unit N/A.

simplesect.title: Error Handling
simplesect.para: No error handling is performed by RteLight. This has to be done by the application software

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Testcase shall check the value of signal value and transformer status value .

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: The test technique involves: boundary value test, equivalence class partitioning, error guessing, statement testing, decision testing Tested in TEST_Rte_Read_SWC_PORT_SIGNAL

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This covers the generic function Rte_Read_<SWC>_<PORT>_<SIGNAL> from architecture. Satisfies following DOORS Requirements:

briefdescription.para: Contains AUTOSAR specific macros and functions used to integrate the SWC:

detaileddescription.para:
Source
Rte_SWC.h Revision
version Author
author Date
date - declaration of queue initialization

Intended to be directly included by the SWCs' files. Include own header files in the testcase file (SWATT), no stubs for data types and function prototypes. Add software requirement IDs in the testcases.
